name: TinyMCE shortcode Addon
author: Themeone

sections.description:
Foreigncodes Tinymce Shortcodes, is a wordpress tinymce addon, that jazz up your wordpress post with cool design.

This plugin comes with over 10 preset button styles, toggles, accordion and grid layout you can easily input in your article.

Simple to use / understand feature, loads of options to select from

Features

Shortcodes Included

Buttons, Videos, Alerts, Google Maps, Toggle, Tabs, dividers, Columns And much more! Easily add nice looking elements to your WordPress website without any knowledge of coding!

Wide-range of field types and options

Support

All support for this plugin is provided through our forums. If you have not registered yet, you can do so here for FREE
https://foreigncodes.com/community/plugin_surport/

Plugin Links

  • [Report Bugs/Issues]https://foreigncodes.com/community/plugin_surport/
sections.installation:
From within WordPress

  1. Visit Plugins > Add New
  2. Search for Foreigncodes Tinymce Shortcodes
  3. Click the Install Now button to install the plugin
  4. Click the Activate button to activate the plugin

Manually

  1. Unzip the download package
  2. Upload Foreigncodes-tinymce-shortcodes to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  3. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress

From within WordPress

  3. Click the Install Now button to install the plugin
  4. Click the Activate button to activate the plugin

Manually

  1. Unzip the download package
  2. Upload Foreigncodes-tinymce-shortcodes to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  3. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
